Customers have a choice of two mutually exclusive monitoring systems for the PowerHub 2 PDU:
WaveStar Infinity is Eaton PDI’s latest metering and monitoring solution for the Power Hub 2 platform and is recommended for all new data center buildouts. It was launched in 2018 and offers revenue grade accuracy, high speed data communication, and a color touchscreen display with an intuitive user interface.
WaveStar Monitoring is Eaton PDI’s previous metering and monitoring standard, which includes the WaveStar Color Monitor, launched in 2014. WaveStar Monitoring is still available for the PowerHub 2 PDU. This chapter summaries installation of WaveStar Infinity on PowerHub 2 PDUs. You should consult WaveStar Infinity Monitoring System, Setup and Operation P-164001106, for detailed information on setting up your WaveStar Infinity System, making local and network connections, and operational use of the WaveStar Infinity system.
